body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for calling Vincenzo's Benzos. My name is Bryan Sanchez. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Bryan, my name is Tiffany Brown.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Tiffany. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm interested in one of the cars I saw on your website and I wanted to get more information.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great! Could you tell me which car model you are interested in?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm looking at the Benzos Regal, the two zero two three model.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: The two zero two three Benzos Regal is a fantastic choice. Could I have your phone number in case we get disconnected?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five, eight seven two, one two one two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. Also, may I know your email address so I can send you some additional information about the Regal?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's tiffany dot brown at example dot com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect, Tiffany. I've noted everything down. I'll email you the details shortly. Thank you for your time and for reaching out to Vincenzo's Benzos. Have a great day!

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Bryan! Have a great day, too.

body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Bryan Sanchez and the customer's name is Tiffany Brown.  The conversation is about Vincenzo's Benzos (a Car Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.
